text: Frances Kidder was the last woman to be publicly hanged in the United Kingdom. She had murdered 12-year-old Louis Kidder-Staple. She was hanged on April 2, 1868. ==Related pages== *Michael Barrett, the last public hanging in the United Kingdom *Robert Smith (murderer), the last public hanging in Scotland and second-to-last public hanging in the United Kingdom Category:1868 deaths Category:People executed by hanging
title: Frances Kidder
